item.title: U.S. Closes Its Kyiv Embassy, Warning of ‘Significant Air Attack’
item.description: The unusual alert came a day after Ukraine used American-made ballistic missiles to strike Russian territory for the first time.

item.title: As Trump Pushes Peace, Russia Intensifies Assaults on Ukraine
item.description: Overextended and exhausted, Ukrainian forces lack manpower and artillery against Russian forces willing to absorb staggering casualties.

item.title: Middle East Airlines Has Become an Unlikely National Hero in Lebanon
item.description: Middle East Airlines has managed to fly through regional and civil wars since the 1960s. And it is still in the skies today.
